This API marks multiple forum topics as spam.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Status label by which topics must be filtered. The value of this key varies according to the topic type. Values allowed are: @NOSTATUS@, @NEEDMOREINFO@, @WORKINGONIT@, @ANSWERED@, @UNANSWERED@, @MAYBELATER@, @UNDERREVIEW@, @IMPLEMENTED@, @WILLNOTIMPLEMENT@, @NOTAPROBLEM@, @TEMPORARYFIX@, @ANALYZING@, @SOLVED@, @UNSOLVED@, and @MOSTVOTED@.

schema.description: Status label by which topics must be filtered. The value of this key varies according to the topic type. fieldName.description: Specifies the name of the field to be updated. The allowed values are ! @categoryId@ - ID of the community category ! _Note:_  ! 1) If the category has forums, then provide the forum ID. ! 2)If the category has no forums, then provide the category ID.! @type@ - Type of the community topic. _Example:_ ~QUESTION~, ~IDEA~, ~PROBLEM~, ~ANNOUNCEMENT~, ~DISCUSSION~. ! @isSticky@ - Boolean value that specifies whether the topic should be pinned. ! @isLocked@ - Specifies whether the topics should be locked. !

fieldValue.description: Specifies the value corresponding to the selected ~fieldName.~ ! _For example,_ if ~fieldName~ is set to categoryId, then the category ID will be provided as the field value. The API will update all the specified topic IDs with the provided categoryId.!
